mapper.insert: insert into wkb_user (u_id, u_identifier,u_name, u_pwd, u_sex, u_brithday, u_title, u_mobile, u_tel, u_fax, u_email, u_addr, u_zipcode, u_default, c_id, u_company,u_income,o_id, p_id, okc_flag, u_admin, u_onoff, task_share, u_appkey, u_appsecret, creator, crtdatetime, logintime,imageUrl) values (#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{uBrithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{uIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{okcFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{uAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{uOnoff,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{taskShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uAppkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uAppsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select * from wkb_user where u_id=#{uId} and u_onoff=1
select * from wkb_user where u_mobile=#{mobile} and u_onoff=1
select * from wkb_user where u_identifier=#{identifier} and u_onoff=1
mapper.update:
update wkb_user
u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_identifier = #{uIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_pwd = #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_sex = #{uSex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
u_brithday = #{uBrithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
u_title = #{uTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_mobile = #{uMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_tel = #{uTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_fax = #{uFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_addr = #{uAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_zipcode = #{uZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_default = #{uDefault,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_income = #{uIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_company = #{uCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
okc_flag = #{okcFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
u_admin = #{uAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
u_onoff = #{uOnoff,jdbcType=TINYINT},
task_share = #{taskShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_appkey = #{uAppkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_appsecret = #{uAppsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crtdatetime = #{crtdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
imageUrl = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where u_id=#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from wkb_user where u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u_onoff=1
SELECT * FROM wkb_user where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u_admin = #{uAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT} and u_onoff=1
SELECT * FROM wkb_user where c_id = #{cId} and okc_flag = 1 and u_onoff=1
SELECT * FROM wkb_user where c_id = #{cId} and u_admin = #{uAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT} and okc_flag = #{okcFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} and u_onoff=1
select count(a.u_id) from wkb_user a where c_id = #{companyId} and a.okc_flag = 1
select a.* from wkb_user a where c_id = #{companyId} and a.okc_flag = 1 and a.u_id!={exculdeUserId} and u_onoff=1 order by a.u_name limit #{index},#{pageSize}
mapper.update:
update wkb_user set okc_flag=1,jointime=#{jointtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where (okc_flag = 0 or okc_flag =2 or okc_flag is null) and c_id=#{cId} and
u_id=#{item}

update wkb_user set u_admin =1 where /*okc_flag = 1 and*/ c_id=#{cId} and (u_admin =0 or u_admin is null) and
u_id=#{item}

update wkb_user set u_admin =1,okc_flag = 2 where /*okc_flag = 1 and*/ c_id=#{cId} and (u_admin =0 or u_admin is null) and
u_id=#{item}

update wkb_user set u_admin =0 where /*okc_flag = 1 and*/ c_id=#{cId} and (u_admin =1 or u_admin =2) and
u_id=#{item}
mapper.select: select a.* from wkb_user a where u_onoff=1 and u_company like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%') order by a.u_id limit #{startPos}, #{endPos}
select a.* from wkb_user a where u_onoff=1 and u_mobile like CONCAT('%',#{mobile},'%') order by a.u_id limit #{startPos}, #{endPos}
select a.* from wkb_user a where u_onoff=1 and u_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by a.u_id limit #{startPos}, #{endPos}
select a.* from wkb_user a where u_onoff=1 and u_title like CONCAT('%',#{position},'%') order by a.u_id limit #{startPos}, #{endPos}

select users.* from wkb_user users,wkb_postright rights,wkb_orgpost post,wkb_organization orgs where orgs.id=rights.o_id and rights.id=post.p_id and orgs.o_father_id is NULL and post.u_id=users.u_id
and users.u_company like CONCAT('%',#{search.searchValue},'%')
and users.u_title like CONCAT('%',#{search.searchValue},'%')
and (users.u_company like CONCAT('%',#{search.searchValue},'%') or users.u_title like CONCAT('%',#{search.searchValue},'%') or users.u_name like CONCAT('%',#{search.searchValue},'%'))
order by users.u_name limit #{startPos},#{endPos}
